summary: This document is an email exchange between Amanda Kirby and Vahe Stepanian discussing the transfer of assets related to Jeffrey Epstein. The conversation indicates a planned delay in the asset transfer process until the following Monday, as suggested by a third party named Harry.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is involved in discussions regarding the transfer of assets related to Epstein.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is responding to Amanda Kirby about the asset transfer, suggesting a delay.

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry is mentioned as having suggested to wait until Monday to proceed with the asset transfer.

connections.description: Both are associates discussing the asset transfer related to Epstein.
Harry provides a suggestion to Vahe regarding the timing of the asset transfer.

events.title: Discussion on Asset Transfer
events.description: Amanda Kirby and Vahe Stepanian discuss the timing of transferring assets related to Epstein.

keyFacts: The email exchange is dated November 27, 2013.
Amanda Kirby and Vahe Stepanian are associates at Deutsche Bank discussing Epstein's assets.
Harry is mentioned as a third party who suggested delaying the asset transfer until Monday.
